product_name: Vasque Mantra 2.0 GTX Hiking Shoes - Women's
long_description: These women's Vasque Mantra 2.0 GTX hiking shoes feature dependable Gore-Tex protection and a lightweight, agile platform for excellent trail performance. GORE-TEX(R) waterproof liners let feet breathe while protecting them from the elements, keeping them dry and comfortable. Nubuck leather uppers supply durability, flexibility and natural water resistance; abrasion-resistant nylon mesh provides breathability for added comfort. Vasque Perpetuum last offers a versatile platform that excels in all-day use; straight shape and broad toe box accommodate low-arched feet and natural forefoot expansion. Padded cuffs and tongues provide comfort on the go; heel loops aid entry. Quick-drying nylon linings wick moisture away from feet for enhanced comfort. Polyurethane midsoles deliver all-day cushioning and excellent stability; thermoplastic urethane shanks offer support and rigidity for a stable ride over changing terrain. The Vasque Mantra 2.0 GTX hiking shoes sport lightweight Vibram(R) rubber outsoles on a versatile tread pattern for all-terrain performance.
short_description: These women's Vasque Mantra 2.0 GTX hiking shoes feature dependable Gore-Tex protection and a lightweight, agile platform for excellent trail performance.
